docs.text: Overview This project aims to act as an device hub which collects sensor data and puts it into InfluxDB Time-Series database for quick visualization. Hardware Requirements EnOcean STM 550 Multisensor EnOcean USB 3000 Radio Receiver Raspberry Pi 3+ Software Requirements On Raspberry Pi you need them to be installed; Docker Docker Compose AdditionallyOn somewhere on Cloud or you infrastructure you need InfluxDB Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
